8 A YÇ’ng-LÃ¨ TÅng-BÇo (æ°¸æ¨‚é€šå¯¶) cash coin cast under the YÇ’ng-LÃ¨ Emperor (æ°¸æ¨‚å¸), these were cast in great quantities for export to neighbouring countries like Japan (the Ashikaga Shogunate), and the RyÅ«kyÅ« Kingdom, as well as further countries like the Majapahit Empire (an island realm ruled from Java) where these coins are still commonly dug up today (as of 2017).
